special_issues.title: Remote Sensing of Ecohydrology
special_issues.guest_editors: Hongliang Ma, Benjamin Dechant, Jiangyuan Zeng, Aleixandre Verger, William K. Smith, Youngryel Ryu
special_issues.description: This special issue aims to highlight pioneering advancements in remote sensing of ecohydrology, fostering the exchange of leading-edge research and ideas on water-carbon coupling in terrestrial ecosystems.

special_issues.title: Advances in Geostationary Ocean Color Remote Sensing
special_issues.description: Special issue on GOCI-II compiling research results and studies for developing next-generation ocean color remote sensing capabilities.

special_issues.title: Large Area Monitoring with Landsat
special_issues.description: Focusing on generating essential large area datasets such as land cover, forest dynamics, phenology and evapotranspiration for addressing climate and land use challenges.

special_issues.title: The Politics of Spatial Inclusion in Cities
special_issues.guest_editors: Rashid Mushkani, Robert J. Chaskin, Shin Koseki
special_issues.description: This special issue examines the politics of spatial inclusion, exploring how land use, design, location, visibility, mobility, and enforcement distribute opportunities in urban spaces.

special_issues.title: Territorial Innovation for Cities and Regions
special_issues.description: Exploring innovative approaches to territorial development and urban-regional planning.
